New.Headline: API for creating AssetIcons addons
New.Body: Created an API that allows users to customize and extend AssetIcons.

New.Headline: Support for Unity Addressables Asset References
New.Body: Utilised the API for expanding AssetIcons with new features to add support for Unity's Addressables.

New.Headline: Updated preferences menu design
New.Body: Now with clearer links for support and queries as well as a leave-a-review dialog.

Changed.Headline: Removed allocations from the draw-loop
Changed.Body: Optimized the draw-loop by removing allocations and expanding caching.

Changed.Headline: Improved documentation look and feel
Changed.Body: Improved the documentation styling with the new logo and new graphics.

Fixes.Headline: Fixed long delays after domain reload
Fixes.Body: Limited the search for the AssetIcon attribute to just dependant assemblies.

Fixes.Headline: Fixed issues when used alongside JetBrains.Rider plugin
Fixes.Body: Fixed compiler errors when using alongside JetBrains.Rider plugin by removing my compatibility-shim.
